string.name: charger_instruction
string.data:
So you can set up this alarm:


1. Connect the charger to the outlet from which you usually charge the phone
 2. Connect the charger cable to the phone
 3. Clicking "Let's rest"
 4. Enjoy a restful sleep
 5. The app will wake you up when the power comes on

string.name: wifi_instruction
string.data:
So you can set up this alarm:


1. Turn on the WIFI
 2. Clicking "Let's rest"
 3. Enjoy a restful sleep
 4. The app will wake you up when the power comes on


This variation could be useful if your phone is charging by powerbank

resources.string: This application will come in handy when you have no electricity at home and you want to sleep and wait for it to connect
